page.title: 11LEISURE FACILITIES CLOWNE
page.content: THERE ARE FOOTBALL PITCHES MARKED OUT ON VARIOUS PIECES OF OPEN SPACE FOR PUBLIC USE. FOR THE YOUNGSTERS IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE 3 SETS OF PLAYGROUND EQUIPMENT WITH SLIDES,SWINGS AND CLIMBING FRAMES. THERE IS A CLUB FOR ROAD RUNNERS SOME OF WHOSE MEMBERS COMPETE IN MARATHONS AND HALF MARATHONS THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY.ONE OF THE MOST WELL KNOWN MEMBERS IS MR.FRANK DOOLEY WHO IS 78 AND IS REGULARLY SEEN RUNNING IN THE AREA.ON SUNDAY JULY 7TH ALONG WITH 7 OTHER MEMBERS FROM CLOWNE HE SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED THE MANSFIELD HALF MARATHON WINNING A PRIZE FOR BEING THE FASTEST CNTESTANT OVER 60. THERE IS ALSO A CYCLING CLUB WHOSE MEMBERS REGULARLY GO OUT CYCLING ON SUNDAYS.FINALLY THERE IS A BADMINTON CLUB WHICH USES THE COLLEGE HALL.
